item.description:
Scott's One Man Show called Feeding My Soul
When: Opening reception July 15th, 2006 from 7PM to 10PM
Where: The Well
38 Harlow Street
Worcester, MA 01605
508-579-1574

Free and open to the public

The Show will run
July 8-August 20th, 2006

Scott Erb, Award Winning Local Photographer, to Showcase Figurative Work in One Man Show

The Well announced a showing of the limited edition photography of the award winning photographer, Scott Erb. The exhibition is to showcase his early and recent figurative photography.

The Well, www.harlowstreet.com, today announced a showing of the limited edition photography of award winning photographer, Scott Erb. The exhibition is to showcase his earlier and recent figurative photography.

In todayâ€™s uncertain climate of world turmoil, Photographer Scott Erb turned to his camera to capture what he feels is real beauty. He hopes others will look at his work and see it as well. His figurative and digitally manipulated work will be on display at The Well, a local gallery located in the heart of the Sprinkler Factory at 38 Harlow Street, Worcester, MA.

Or you can visit http://www.theintimat...
or http://www.harlowstre... for information and directions to the gallery.


For more information, see http://www.theintimat...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Feeding My Soul
